Name: Barbara
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: Creamy and delicately flavoured. The nutmeg garnish plays as important a role as the cacao liqueur.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Stanley M. Jones' 1977 Jones' Complete Barguide .
Nutrition: One serving of Barbara contains 191 calories
